snippet.title: Anomaly Investigations Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now!
There's also a free demo available with anomalies not found in the full game!

https://mcflygold.itch.io/anomaly-investigations

Inspired by games like Observation Duty and The Exit 8.

Dive into the depths of Anomaly Investigations, where you step into the shoes of a "volunteer" investigator tasked with unraveling the secrets of a mysterious underground hallway. Delve into the heart of the unknown as you navigate through a  seemingly endless corridors, each time uncovering new anomalies and unexplained phenomena. With every loop, the truth inches closer, challenging your wit and determination and observational skills in this dangerous journey of discovery and intrigue.
